snippet: Mr. Lord’s Hammond B-3 organ — with its signal routed through a Marshall amplifier to give it a distorted tang — was key to Deep Purple’s style.
abstract: Jon Lord, keyboardist of the pioneering British hard-rock band Deep Purple, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lord’s Hammond B-3 organ — with its signal routed through a Marshall amplifier to give it a distorted tang — was key to Deep Purple’s style.

headline.seo: Jon Lord, Keyboardist With Deep Purple, Dies at 71
headline.main: Jon Lord, Keyboardist With Deep Purple, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Jon Lord, 71, Keyboardist With Deep Purple
